mapper.insert: insert into CREATOR(CREATORBNO,CREATORID, CREATORMAJOR, CREATORCAREER, CREATORCAREER1, CREATORCAREER2, CREATORAWARDS, CREATORAWARDS1, CREATORAWARDS2) values(CREATOR1_SEQ.nextval, #{creatorId}, #{creatorMajor}, #{creatorCareer}, #{creatorCareer1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorCareer2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorAwards}, #{creatorAwards1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorAwards2, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
